text: Erzsébet Mezei was a female Hungarian international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won two bronze medals at the 1949 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's doubles with Rozsi Karpati and in the women's team. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Hungarian female table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Erzsébet Mezei
